system.description: Back-alley urchins, gutterborn scum, shadow-born assassins. To hammers, every problem looks like a nail. Rogues are blades, and every problem is a throat.

features.name: Sneak Attack
features.description:
If your first attack on a Turn is Favored, it deals an extra d4 damage and ignores an amount of Armor equal to this number of extra dice.

The number of extra d4s increases by 1 every 3 Rogue Levels hereafter.

features.name: Infiltrator
features.description: You gain the Resourceful Perk, and you have Favor on Checks and Saves made to ambush and against traps that you are aware of.

features.name: Unflinching Luck
features.description: When you spend Luck to gain Favor on a Check, roll a d12. If the result is lower than your remaining Luck, the Luck is not spent.

features.name: Evasive
features.description: Your Reflex Saves can't be Hindered while you aren't Incapacitated, and you ignore two of a Dodged attack's damage dice on a passed Save, rather than one.

features.name: Lethal Weapon
features.description: Your Sneak Attack applies to any Favored attacks you make on a Turn, not just the first.

features.name: Unflinching Luck II
features.description: Your Unflinching Luck Feature now uses a d10 instead of a d12.

features.name: Waylay
features.description: Once per Round, if you kill an Enemy during a Turn, you can immediately take one Action.
